author: Ainy Cormac
description:
The Shadow of the Torturer by Gene Wolfe, the first volume in The Book of the New Sun tetralogy, is a dark, dream-like fantasy novel that blurs the line between myth and memory. A densely-layered and influential novel, it laid much of the groundwork for later grimdark authors. For lovers of dark fantasy and those […]

The post REVIEW: The Shadow of the Torturer by Gene Wolfe appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Shadow of the Torturer by Gene Wolfe
